tool_description: Summarized data of cities on Wikipedia
name: Wikipedia City Data
title: Wikipedia City Data

api_list.name: /cities/dependencies-by-population
api_list.description: Get list of countries and dependencies by population
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wikipedia-city-data.p.rapidapi.com/cities/dependencies-by-population"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wikipedia-city-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wikipedia-city-data.p.rapidapi.com/cities/dependencies-by-population"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wikipedia-city-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
